text: avarkal (kotumaikkara aracan munnilaiyil) eluntu ninru"vanankalukkum, pumikkum iraivanakiya avane, enkalutaiya iraivan; ekkalattum avanaiyanri veru evaraiyum nayanenru alaikka mattom; (appatic ceytal kuhpril kontu cerkkum) - varampu miriyataic connavarkal avom" enru avarkal urutiyakak kuriya nilaiyil avarkal itayankalai nam valuppatuttinom
